Body:
"""
        Test that a Locate request payload can be written to a data stream
        even when missing the offset items.
        """
payload = payloads.LocateRequestPayload(maximum_items=1,
    storage_status_mask=3, object_group_member=enums.ObjectGroupMember.
    GROUP_MEMBER_DEFAULT, attributes=[objects.Attribute(attribute_name=
    objects.Attribute.AttributeName('Object Group'), attribute_value=
    primitives.TextString(value='RoundRobinTestGroup', tag=enums.Tags.
    OBJECT_GROUP))])
stream = utils.BytearrayStream()
payload.write(stream)
self.assertEqual(len(self.no_offset_items_encoding), len(stream))
self.assertEqual(str(self.no_offset_items_encoding), str(stream))
